name: A Hero of Justice's Triumph
title: Varesa: A Hero of Justice's Triumph
in_play_description:
After Varesa triggers Tag-Team Triple Jump!: Gain 1 Energy.
Elemental Bursts from Varesa, who has this card equipped, deal +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Varesa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Varesa.
After Varesa triggers Tag-Team Triple Jump!: Gain 1 Energy.
Elemental Bursts from Varesa, who has this card equipped, deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Varesa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
